entry.tran: 乳白色的;苍白的;淡白色的
entry.def: If you describe something as milky, you mean that it is pale white in colour. You can describe other colours as milky when they are very pale.

example.ex: A milky mist filled the valley.
example.tran: 白蒙蒙的薄雾弥漫山谷。

example.ex: ...the distant view of mountain ranges, white against a milky blue sky.
example.tran: 映衬在淡蓝色天空背景下的白茫茫的山脉远景

entry.def: Drinks or food that are milky contain a lot of milk.
